verses.verse: How has the Lord<WH136> covered<WH5743> the daughter<WH1323> of Zion<WH6726> with a cloud<WH5743> in his anger!<WH639> He has cast down<WH7993> from heaven<WH8064> to the earth<WH776> the beauty<WH8597> of Israel,<WH3478> And hasn't<WH2142> remembered his footstool<WH1916> in the day<WH3117> of his anger.<WH639>

The Lord<WH136> has swallowed up<WH1104> all the habitations<WH4999> of Jacob,<WH3290> and has not pitied:<WH2550> He has thrown down<WH2040> in his wrath<WH5678> the strongholds<WH4013> of the daughter<WH1323> of Judah;<WH3063> He has brought them down<WH5060> to the ground;<WH776> he has profaned<WH2490> the kingdom<WH4467> and its princes.<WH8269>

He has cut off<WH1438> in fierce<WH2750> anger<WH639> all the horn<WH7161> of Israel;<WH3478> He has drawn<WH7725> back<WH268> his right hand<WH3225> from before<WH6440> the enemy:<WH341> He has burned<WH1197> up Jacob<WH3290> like a flaming<WH3852> fire,<WH784> which devours<WH398> all around.<WH5439>

He has bent<WH1869> his bow<WH7198> like an enemy,<WH341> he has stood<WH5324> with his right hand<WH3225> as an adversary,<WH6862> Has killed<WH2026> all that were pleasant<WH4261> to the eye:<WH5869> In the tent<WH168> of the daughter<WH1323> of Zion<WH6726> he has poured out<WH8210> his wrath<WH2534> like fire.<WH784>

The Lord<WH136> has become as an enemy,<WH341> he has swallowed up<WH1104> Israel;<WH3478> He has swallowed up<WH1104> all her palaces,<WH759> he has destroyed<WH7843> his strongholds;<WH4013> He has multiplied<WH7235> in the daughter<WH1323> of Judah<WH3063> mourning<WH8386> and lamentation.<WH592>

He has violently taken away<WH2554> his tabernacle,<WH7900> as if it were of a garden;<WH1588> he has destroyed<WH7843> his place of assembly:<WH4150> Yahweh<WH3068> has caused solemn assembly<WH4150> and Sabbath<WH7676> to be forgotten<WH7911> in Zion,<WH6726> Has despised<WH5006> in the indignation<WH2195> of his anger<WH639> the king<WH4428> and the priest.<WH3548>

The Lord<WH136> has cast off<WH2186> his altar,<WH4196> he has abhorred<WH5010> his sanctuary;<WH4720> He has given up<WH5462> into the hand<WH3027> of the enemy<WH341> the walls<WH2346> of her palaces:<WH759> They have made<WH5414> a noise<WH6963> in the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> as in the day<WH3117> of a solemn assembly.<WH4150>

Yahweh<WH3068> has purposed<WH2803> to destroy<WH7843> the wall<WH2346> of the daughter<WH1323> of Zion;<WH6726> He has stretched out<WH5186> the line,<WH6957> he has not withdrawn<WH7725> his hand<WH3027> from destroying;<WH1104> He has made the rampart<WH2426> and wall<WH2346> to lament;<WH56> they languish<WH535> together.<WH3162>

Her gates<WH8179> are sunk<WH2883> into the ground;<WH776> he has destroyed<WH6> and broken<WH7665> her bars:<WH1280> Her king<WH4428> and her princes<WH8269> are among the nations<WH1471> where the law<WH8451> is not;<WH5030> Yes, her prophets find<WH4672> no vision<WH2377> from Yahweh.<WH3068>

The elders<WH2205> of the daughter<WH1323> of Zion<WH6726> sit<WH3427> on the ground,<WH776> they keep silence;<WH1826> They have cast up<WH5927> dust<WH6083> on their heads;<WH7218> they have clothed<WH2296> themselves with sackcloth:<WH8242> The virgins<WH1330> of Jerusalem<WH3389> hang down<WH3381> their heads<WH7218> to the ground.<WH776>

My eyes<WH5869> do fail<WH3615> with tears,<WH1832> my heart<WH4578> is troubled;<WH2560> My liver<WH3516> is poured<WH8210> on the earth,<WH776> because of the destruction<WH7667> of the daughter<WH1323> of my people,<WH5971> Because the young children<WH5768> and the infants<WH3243> swoon<WH5848> in the streets<WH7339> of the city.<WH7151>

They tell<WH559> their mothers,<WH517> Where is grain<WH1715> and wine?<WH3196> When they swoon<WH5848> as the wounded<WH2491> in the streets<WH7339> of the city,<WH5892> When their soul<WH5315> is poured out<WH8210> into their mothers<WH517>' bosom.<WH2436>

What shall I testify<WH5749> to you?<WH4100> what shall I liken<WH1819> to you,<WH1323> daughter of Jerusalem?<WH3389> What shall I compare<WH7737> to you,<WH5162> that I may comfort you,<WH1330> virgin daughter<WH1323> of Zion?<WH6726> For your breach<WH7667> is great<WH1419> like the sea:<WH3220> who can heal you?<WH7495>

Your prophets<WH5030> have seen<WH2372> for you false<WH7723> and foolish visions;<WH8602> They have not uncovered<WH1540> your iniquity,<WH5771> to bring back<WH7725> your captivity,<WH7622> but have seen<WH2372> for you false<WH7723> oracles<WH4864> and causes of banishment.<WH4065>

All that pass<WH5674> by clap<WH5606> their hands<WH3709> at you.<WH1870> They hiss<WH8319> and wag<WH5128> their head<WH7218> at the daughter<WH1323> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> saying,<WH5892> Is this the city that men called<WH559> The perfection<WH3632> of beauty,<WH3308> The joy<WH4885> of the whole earth?<WH776>

All your enemies<WH341> have opened<WH6475> their mouth<WH6310> wide against you;<WH8319> They hiss and gnash<WH2786> the teeth;<WH8127> they say,<WH559> We have swallowed her up;<WH1104> Certainly<WH389> this is the day<WH3117> that we looked for;<WH6960> we have found,<WH4672> we have seen it.<WH7200>

Yahweh<WH3068> has done<WH6213> that which he purposed;<WH2161> he has fulfilled<WH1214> his word<WH565> that he commanded<WH6680> in the days<WH3117> of old;<WH6924> He has thrown down,<WH2040> and has not pitied:<WH2550> He has caused the enemy<WH341> to rejoice<WH8055> over you;<WH7311> he has exalted the horn<WH7161> of your adversaries.<WH6862>

Their heart<WH3820> cried<WH6817> to the Lord:<WH136> wall<WH2346> of the daughter<WH1323> of Zion,<WH6726> let tears<WH1832> run down<WH3381> like a river<WH5158> day<WH3119> and night;<WH3915> Give<WH5414> yourself no respite;<WH6314> don't<WH1323> let the apple of your eye<WH5869> cease.<WH1826>

Arise,<WH6965> cry out<WH7442> in the night,<WH3915> at the beginning<WH7218> of the watches;<WH821> Pour out<WH8210> your heart<WH3820> like water<WH4325> before<WH5227> the face<WH6440> of the Lord:<WH136> Lift up<WH5375> your hands<WH3709> toward him for the life<WH5315> of your young children,<WH5768> that faint<WH5848> for hunger<WH7458> at the head<WH7218> of every street.<WH2351>

Look,<WH7200> Yahweh,<WH3068> and see<WH7200> to whom you have done<WH5953> thus!<WH3541> Shall the women<WH802> eat<WH398> their fruit,<WH6529> the children<WH5768> that are dandled<WH2949> in the hands?<WH3548> Shall the priest and the prophet<WH5030> be killed<WH2026> in the sanctuary<WH4720> of the Lord?<WH136>

The youth<WH5288> and the old<WH2205> man lie<WH7901> on the ground<WH776> in the streets;<WH2351> My virgins<WH1330> and my young men<WH970> are fallen<WH5307> by the sword:<WH2719> You have killed<WH2873> them in the day<WH3117> of your anger;<WH639> you have slaughtered,<WH2873> and not pitied.<WH2550>

You have called,<WH7121> as in the day<WH3117> of a solemn<WH4150> assembly,<WH4032> my terrors on every side;<WH5439> There was none that escaped<WH6412> or remained<WH8300> in the day<WH3117> of Yahweh<WH3068>'s anger:<WH639> Those that I have dandled<WH2946> and brought up<WH7235> has my enemy<WH341> consumed.<WH3615>
